EmailTemplate.description: Email template sent to the internal PR employee to confirm that his request was taken into consideration.
EmailTemplate.name: External User Request into consideration
EmailTemplate.subject: Pernod Ricard Chatter® – External User Access Into Consideration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!External_User_Request__c.CreatedBy},
Your external access request for Pernod Ricard Chatter® for {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_First_Name__c} {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Last_Name__c} – {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Company__c} has been sent out.
The following email address has been used to send the invitation : {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Email__c}.
The user will be invited in the following group : {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Group_Name__c}.
Two steps must be fulfilled before {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_First_Name__c} {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Last_Name__c} can access Chatter :
1 – Your manager {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Created_By_s_Manager__c} must approve your request 2 - The external user{!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_First_Name__c} {!External_User_Request__c.EXT_USR_RQT_Last_Name__c} has been requested to sign the ESN Policy and NDA before he/she can access chatter.
Those two steps are mandatory steps before the external user can access Pernod Ricard Chatter®.
Best regards,
Pernod Ricard Chatter® Team
